item.title: Scott Bessent Fires Back At Bob Elliott's Claim That Tariffs 'Offset' Rent Relief, Says Critics 'Don't Get To Cherry-Pick' Inflation
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent refutes Bob Elliott's analysis that tariffs are fueling inflation, calling the claim "cherry-picking." read more

item.title: Scott Bessent Warns Military Pay At Risk By Mid November Amid Shutdown: 'What An Embarrassment'
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent accused Democratic leaders of causing the ongoing government shutdown. read more
